name: Sizeshift Serum
description: A brew thats a little bit bitter and salty. Somehow magical, despite the horrid taste. Safe to ingest, but you'll probably want a palate cleanser after.
effect: When consumed, you unlock the ability to increase or decrease your size (within the +/- 33% scale) at will while in a safe area. During combat, at GM's Discretion, you may change size under stress at the cost of an Action.
